title: Riot please implement a system that alerts you when someone you have reported gets banned
body: Pretty self explanatory but still missing from LoL

replies.body: they have, doesn't tell you who the person was, but lets you know if punishment was given due to your reports

Would any of you care to elaborate on where i could find this feature? 
Btw really appreciate all comments

usually in your notifications tab (explaination mark symbol) at the bottom of the friends list bar
when you get the notification it will tell you sort of like when you move up a tier in ranked, a little message box comes up with the rest of the screen blacked out

It's called the "Instant Feedback System" and, as far as I'm aware, is still in the process of being properly implemented. Last I heard was that it only notifies the last person to have reported the punished player currently, with plans for more players to be notified when Riot has set it up properly. Pretty sure it's not even been ramped up entirely.
It only comes up if they are banned directly from your game though not if they are banned after being reported in future games

it is normally just a pop up 

I had a pop up about 3 weeks ago saying thanks to me and a few other players reporting a player the tribunal was able to take action

I took that as thanks for reporting that ragger got banned
Thanks everyone for being very courteous and helpful!
